comments:
1. Create library with EPF-Composer 1.0.2 RCP
2. Start Eclipse-Runtime with head-projects of EPF (using Eclipse SDK, Version: 3.3.0, Build id: I20070323-1616)
3. Try to open library created with EPF-Composer
4. Confirm to "upgrade to new library structure"
5. Backup library before migration
5. Migration throws Exception:

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.emf.ecore.sdo.impl.EPropertyImpl incompatible with org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature

Updating to new emf version resolved problems.
